name: Electrus
description:
Electrus is a 2D top-viewed game that involves playing part as a red plus. You must locate your way through a set of different rooms using the map, whilst collecting all green minuses within the time limit.

The game offers an 8-bit voice that greets and congratulates you at the beginning and end of the game, as well as 3 small secrets to be discovered. It also offers interesting 8-bit like music whilst the game has started and during the menu.

The area could potentially take place in a ship in space (still vague for the moment).
